name: trending_app
description: A vanilla TypeScript single-page app with a Vercel serverless backend.

scripts.start: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd .. && npm run dev && npm run build
scripts.build: tsc --project api/tsconfig.json && npm --prefix client run build
scripts.typecheck: tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p client/tsconfig.json && tsc -p server/tsconfig.json && tsc -p api/tsconfig.json
